benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: GET /1.0/kb/accounts/{accountId}/block - Retrieve blocking states for account

covered: GET endpoint returns 200 with a JSON array of BlockingState objects for valid requests (TC01 and related scenarios).
Empty response handling when there are no blocking states (TC08).
Query parameters coverage: blockingStateTypes, blockingStateSvcs, combined filters, and extra/unsupported parameters (TC02, TC03, TC04, TC13, TC21, TC22).
Audit parameter coverage: FULL, MINIMAL, NONE (default) (TC05-TC07).
Authorization handling: missing/invalid tokens returning 401 (TC14, TC15).
Error handling for invalid input values (invalid accountId, invalid blockingStateTypes, invalid audit) (TC10, TC11, TC12).
Resilience and availability scenarios (503 service unavailability, 504 timeout, degraded performance, dependent service failure) (TC16, TC19, TC24, TC25).
Data consistency and cross-system synchronization coverage (TC26) and concurrency (TC27).
Backward compatibility and regression coverage (TC20, TC21).
Security: injection attack tests on query parameters (TC18).
gaps: Pagination handling for large datasets is not tested (no page size, page token, or offset scenarios).
Rate limiting/throttling scenarios are not tested.
Caching semantics (ETag, Cache-Control) are not tested.
Deeper authorization edge cases (403 for insufficient privileges, token expiry) are not tested.
Additional security tests for other vectors and param sanitization beyond blockingStateSvcs are not covered.
recommendations: Add explicit pagination tests to verify correct behavior with large datasets.
Add rate-limiting tests to verify throttling and error paths under load.
Add caching behavior tests to validate ETag/Cache-Control headers and cache revalidation.
Expand authorization tests to cover 403 responses and token expiry.
Extend input validation tests to cover more vectors (accountId injection, multiple invalid combinations), and ensure server-side sanitization.
Include more tests for 304 Not Modified in caching scenarios.
